actions.name: Activate an item
actions.notes: Start vehicle, turn on device, ignite lightsaber.

relatedSkills.when: device needs login or friendly computer

actions.name: Aid another
actions.notes: Aid a skill or attack. Skill aid: DC 10 same skill to grant +2 to ally. Aid attack: attack vs Ref 10 to grant +2 to ally vs that target.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 bonus to ally on that check
+2 to ally's next attack vs that target

actions.name: Aim
actions.notes: Ignore target's cover bonus to Reflex on next attack; lose aim if you lose LOS or take other action before attacking; provokes AoO.

relatedSkills.when: applies to next ranged attack to ignore cover

actions.name: Attack (single)
actions.notes: Normal attack; rate and damage depend on weapon. Melee 2‑handed uses STR×2 to damage; improvised = -5 attack.

relatedSkills.outcome: Compare to target Reflex/Fort/Will as appropriate

actions.name: Area Attack (burst/splash/cone)
actions.notes: Compare attack roll (if >=10) to each target's Ref; hits full, misses half; natural 20 hits all; cannot aim for area attacks.

relatedSkills.outcome: Resolve against each target's Ref; apply cover rules

actions.name: Burst Fire / Autofire (vehicle or weapon)
actions.notes: Autofire targets area 2×2 squares, -5 attack; consumes ammo; braced autofire reduces penalty; burst fire -5 attack +2 dice damage.

relatedSkills.outcome: Area rules; ammo consumption handled by system

actions.name: Charge
actions.notes: Move in straight line; +2 competence to attack; take -2 Reflex until next turn; cannot take other actions after attack.

relatedSkills.outcome: Apply +2 competence, -2 target Reflex

relatedSkills.when: Nimble Charge: to charge through low objects/difficult terrain

actions.name: Coup de grace
actions.notes: Against helpless adjacent opponent; auto-critical; target reduced to 0 HP dies (or destroyed for objects).

relatedSkills.outcome: Auto-crit; immediate lethal effect

actions.name: Draw or Holster Weapon
actions.notes: Draw as move (or draw & activate if weapon requires activation and you are proficient). Drawing concealed weapons = standard.

relatedSkills.when: drawing concealed item in secret; GM may allow opposed Perception

actions.name: Drop an item
actions.notes: Drop item into your space or adjacent square; free/simple.

actions.name: Draw concealed item (conceal/seek)
actions.notes: If concealed on self, drawing is standard and may be opposed by Perception.

relatedSkills.outcome: Detect drawing or concealed item

actions.name: Feint
actions.notes: Deception vs target's Initiative to make target flat-footed vs your next attack. -5 vs non-humanoids/low INT.

relatedSkills.outcome: Target loses Dex bonus to Ref vs your next attack

actions.name: Fight defensively
actions.notes: Standard: -5 attacks, +2 dodge to Ref (or +5 if trained in Acrobatics). Full-round no attacks: +5 dodge (+10 if trained).

actions.name: Full attack
actions.notes: Make multiple attacks; penalties apply to all attacks until next turn; two-weapon penalties apply.

relatedSkills.outcome: Resolve sequence with multiple attack penalties

actions.name: Grapple / Grab
actions.notes: Unarmed attack to grab (-5). If hit, make opposed grapple checks (Grapple uses STR or DEX + BAB + size). Grappled target is denied movement and has -2 attack unless using light weapon.

relatedSkills.outcome: Grabbed/grappled; escape via Acrobatics vs Grappler's check

relatedSkills.when: escape from grapple; DC = grappler's check

actions.name: Disarm
actions.notes: Melee attack at -10 (-15 if weapon held in more than 1 hand). Failure may provoke free attack against you.

relatedSkills.outcome: If succeed, weapon drops; Acrobatics DC20 to catch item (trained)

actions.name: Escape bonds / Escape net
actions.notes: Escape nets: Acrobatics DC15 as full-round; nets often require higher DC to escape as standard.

relatedSkills.outcome: Escape nets; success frees you

actions.name: Manipulate an item
actions.notes: Pick up item (provokes AoO), load weapon (provokes AoO), open door, retrieve stored item (2 move actions, provokes AoO).

actions.name: Move your speed / Move action
actions.notes: Move up to speed; diagonal counts as 2 squares; options include Balance (half speed), Climb (1/4 speed), Tumble (part of move with Acrobatics).

relatedSkills.when: Climb surfaces; see Climb DC table

actions.name: Tumble
actions.notes: Acrobatics DC15 to move through threatened squares without provoking AoO; each threatened square counts as 2 squares of movement.

relatedSkills.outcome: Avoid AoO when moving through threatened spaces

actions.name: Run
actions.notes: Move 4× speed (3× if heavy armor), lose Dex bonus to Ref; can run for CON rounds, then Endurance checks.

relatedSkills.outcome: If fail, -1 persistent CT

actions.name: Reload
actions.notes: Reload is normally a move action and provokes AoO unless specified otherwise.

actions.name: Second Wind
actions.notes: Once per encounter/day: if at or below half hp, heal 1/4 max HP or CON (whichever higher).

actions.name: Snipe
actions.notes: From hiding: make ranged attack then hide again (Stealth check at -10 as move). Must be at least 2 squares away.

relatedSkills.outcome: If success remain hidden; if fail, revealed

actions.name: Stand up from prone
actions.notes: Stand normally as move; trained in Acrobatics can DC15 to stand as swift.

relatedSkills.when: Stand from prone as swift if trained

actions.name: Fall prone
actions.notes: If trained in Acrobatics DC15 you can fall prone as a free action; otherwise swift. Prone penalties apply.

relatedSkills.when: Fall prone as free action if trained

actions.name: Ready an action (prepare)
actions.notes: Specify a trigger and action (move/standard/swift). When trigger occurs you may take the readied action as a reaction; initiative changes to the time you used it.

actions.name: Ready or Recovery actions for vehicles
actions.notes: Vehicle actions include Raise/lower shields (swift), Recharge shields (3 swift w/ Mechanics DC20), regulate power (3 swifts Mechanics DC20).

relatedSkills.outcome: Restore SR or move vehicle CT

actions.name: Perception / Notice targets
actions.notes: Perception vs Stealth or passive size DCs; reaction to notice entering LOS. Reaction swift to retry failed Perception.

relatedSkills.outcome: Notice hidden/concealed targets; apply concealment/cover penalties

actions.name: Create a Diversion to Hide
actions.notes: Deception vs all targets' Will to allow a Stealth attempt while targets are aware. You must be able to reach hiding place with a move.

relatedSkills.outcome: If success, allow Stealth attempt

actions.name: Use Computer / Access information
actions.notes: Use Computer checks to access info: general 15 (1 min), specific 20 (10 min), private 25 (1 hr), secret 30 (1 day) when computer attitude allows.

relatedSkills.outcome: Access levels depend on DC; computer attitude modifies results

actions.name: Use the Force (example: Move Light Object / Breath Control)
actions.notes: UtF powers often require trained UtF checks. Move Light Object: UtF DC10 (move action). Breath Control (UtF) DC15 to double hold-breath rounds.

relatedSkills.outcome: Power effect if succeed; failure consequences vary

actions.name: First Aid / Revivify / Treat Injury
actions.notes: First Aid (medpac) DC15 heal; Revivify DC25 (requires medkit) to revive within 1 round of death.

relatedSkills.outcome: Heals HP or revives on success

actions.name: Disengage / Withdraw
actions.notes: Withdraw at half speed; treat first square as non-threatened; cannot withdraw if must move more than one square to exit threatened area.
